themes: dissatisfaction with post-2022 grant funding changes
perceived harm to organizations from funding policy shifts
key_phrases: Go back to the way you funded grants before 2022
The city is lucky that Abbott hasn’t been made aware of the changes implemented
It’s only a matter of time
it’s too late for organizations who were decimated by these changes
barriers_identified: decimation of organizations due to funding changes
solutions_proposed: return to pre-2022 grant funding model
